title: Don't give me a penalty <3
body:
This patch my client has froze a couple of time AFTER I click accept for a ranked queue, normal queue...
And now i have a 30min penalty ;_;...[](http://i.imgur.com/Oj0TtJr.png)

This could be a bug i guess since it's only been happening this patch??? Dunno

So what do I do? Not play league till next patch?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I doubt its a problem with this patch only, however lets rule that out first.

Could you [run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if this helps.
Don't you lose LP for skipping as well?
